catalog_info.title: Applied Algebra
catalog_info.prereq: Recommended: Applied Mathematics 21a and 21b, or Mathematics 21a and 21b.
catalog_info.description: Introduction to abstract algebra and its applications. Sets, subsets, and partitions; mappings, operations, and equivalence relations; groups, rings, and fields, polynomials, encryption, computer coding, application of modular arithmetic, combinatorial designs, lattices, application of trellis representation of lattices, fast algorithms.
